title: Textile, 1780–1800
medium: Block-printed on linen warp, cotton weft plain weave.
dimensions:
Warp: 108cm (42 1/2in). Weft: (2 pieces sewn together) 134cm (52 3/4in.)
Width of selvage to selvage piece; 71.5cm (28 1/8in.)
description: Reserve print. Lion being attacked by dogs and a hunter with a spear. In red on natural.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1780–1800.
1780–1800. Block-printed on linen warp, cotton weft plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-257.
